'''1.21.6 Pre-Release 3''' (known as '''1.21.6-pre3''' in the launcher) is the third pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.21.6]], released on June 4, 2025.<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-21-6-pre-release-3|Minecraft 1.21.6 Pre-Release 3|June 4, 2025}}</ref>

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''[[Advancement definition]]'''
* Added {{cd|minecraft:player_sheared_equipment}} trigger.
** Can trigger when a player shears off a shearable equipment from an entity.
** Conditions:
*** {{cd|item}} - Item that is sheared.
*** {{cd|entity}} - The entity that was sheared.

== Changes ==
=== Command format ===
'''{{cmd|playsound}}'''
* Added new category {{cd|ui}}.
** Sounds in this category will continue playing when paused, similarly to {{cd|music}}.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Sound]]'''
* Added new sound volume category called "UI" for sounds played by UI elements, like button clicks.

=== General ===
'''[[Data Pack]]'''
* The [[pack format]] version is now {{cd|80}}.
